attributes.action: Bring Back A Popular Spanish Beer, Brewed in Northampton, to our 'Works' Pub...
attributes.additional_details: It's not offensive, it's not an advert, it's not nonsence and it most certainly aint a joke!!!
attributes.background: They had a popular Spanish beer, one brewed in Northampton, but now they don't. 'They' being the nearest pub to our Mediacity Studios....
